description: Alice is a master of fusion cuisine, blending flavors from around the world into delicious, innovative dishes.

recipeName.name: Jatoto shim
method: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
In a small bowl, combine olive oil, garlic powder, salt, and black pepper. Brush mixture over chicken breasts.
Grill chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
In a large bowl, combine mixed greens, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
Slice chicken and add to the salad.
Top with crumbled feta cheese and sliced almonds.
Drizzle balsamic vinaigrette over the top and serve immediately.

recipeName.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
method: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add spaghetti and cook until al dente, according to package instructions.
While spaghetti cooks, cook bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Remove bacon from skillet and set aside.
Add garlic to skillet with bacon grease and cook until fragrant, about 1 minute.
